scripts.blockchain: nodemon --watch src --exec ts-node src/index.js blockchain all --file=..\wallets.json --dump=./output
scripts.pool: nodemon --watch src --exec ts-node src/index.js pool payout --dump=./output
scripts.defi: nodemon --watch src --exec ts-node src/index.js defi balance
scripts.pool:cron: nodemon --watch src --exec ts-node src/index.js pool balance -R "*/30 * * * * *"
